mapper.select: select sto_in.id,sto_in.store_time,sto_in.store_info,sto_in.book_count,sto_in.book_init,b.book_name,b.book_price,qs.qs_name from store_in sto_in inner join book b on sto_in.book_id = b.id inner join qs on qs.id = b.qs_id

select sto_in.id,sto_in.store_time,sto_in.store_info,sto_in.book_count,sto_in.book_init,b.book_name,b.book_price,qs.qs_name from store_in sto_in inner join book b on sto_in.book_id = b.id inner join qs on qs.id = b.qs_id limit #{arg0},#{arg1}
mapper.insert: insert into store_in(id,store_time,store_info,book_count,book_init,book_id) select #{id},#{store_time},#{store_info},#{book_count},#{book_init},b.id from book b where b.book_name=#{book_name} and b.qs_id = (select id from qs where qs.qs_name = #{qs_name} )
mapper.select: select bo.*,middletable.book_count,middletable.book_init from book bo inner join ( select sto_in.* from store_in sto_in where sto_in.book_id in ( select b.id from book b where b.book_kind = #{arg0} ) group by sto_in.book_id ) middletable on bo.id = middletable.book_id
